parameters: "Howdy" & newline & "Move using the arrows on screen"

functionParameters.name: DestroyDelay
functionParameters.comment: Amount of time before notification display text is emptied

children.text: On NotificationDestroy, check content of displayed text against text-to-be-deleted. If match, then the notification hasn't changed and it can be emptied.

functionParameters.comment: The text to display for the new notification
